1b1(nyi khri): / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
1b2(nyi khri): stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po dang de'o//
1b3(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa
2a1(nyi khri): sems dpa' na ma shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod
2a2(nyi khri): pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab
2a3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par
2a4(nyi khri): shes pa yongs su rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi skyed na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod do/
2b1(nyi khri): gal te skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar
2b2(nyi khri): mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid
2b3(nyi khri): thams cad yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
2b4(nyi khri): dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na shes rab kyi pha rol tu
2b5(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang
3a1(nyi khri): po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
3a2(nyi khri): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/
3a3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam
3a4(nyi khri): gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang /
3a5(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid
3b1(nyi khri): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi
3b2(nyi khri): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs
3b3(nyi khri): su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa'i stong
3b4(nyi khri): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po
3b5(nyi khri): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
3b6(nyi khri): byin pa la spyod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su ma rdzogs so zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi
4a1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de
4a2(nyi khri): gzugs ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes
4a3(nyi khri): dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar snga
4a4(nyi khri): mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su ma rdzogs
4a5(nyi khri): so zhes bya ba gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no zhes bya ba de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha
4a6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
4b1(nyi khri): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa dang / ma chags pa legs par
4b2(nyi khri): snyan pa 'di ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de bzhin
4b3(nyi khri): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs
4b4(nyi khri): kyi bu mo rnams la chags pa legs par ston to// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha
4b5(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gal te gzugs chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do//
4b6(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
4b7(nyi khri): pa la spyod do// gal te skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi sbyong na/ shes rab
5a1(nyi khri): na pa // snod sa pa gas pa la/ ma chags banas
5a2(nyi khri): bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
5a3(nyi khri): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
5a4(nyi khri): chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// nang stong pa nyid chags
5a5(nyi khri): pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
5a6(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyi bar du chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// byang chub kyi
5a7(nyi khri): phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 'phags
5b1(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang /
5b2(nyi khri): pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
5b3(nyi khri): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar
5b4(nyi khri): mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar mi
5b5(nyi khri): spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig
5b6(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya
5b7(nyi khri): bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du/ chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes
5b8(nyi khri): bya bar mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar
5b9(nyi khri): spyod na/ gzugs chags pa 'am ma chags pa zhes bya bar/ 'du shes med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
6a1(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar/ 'du shes pa med do// skye mched dang / khams dang /
6a2(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar/ 'du shes pa med do// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs chos
6a3(nyi khri): sum bcu rtsa bdun chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar/ 'du shes pa med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams
6a4(nyi khri): dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang /
6a5(nyi khri): mtshan pa med pa dang / smodan pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar/ 'du shes pa med do// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang /
6a6(nyi khri): gzungs kyi sgo rnams chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar/ 'du shes pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang
6a7(nyi khri): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byangs pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad/ chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar/ 'du shes pa med
6a8(nyi khri): do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu chags pa'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
6b1(nyi khri): dgra bcom pa nyid chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar/ 'du shes pa med do// rang byang chub chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar 'du shes pa med do// bla na med
6b2(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub/ chags pa 'am/ ma chags pa zhes bya bar/ 'du shes pa med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar/ chos zab mo 'di bstan
6b3(nyi khri): kyang / yongs su mi 'grib/ ma bstan kyang yongs su mi 'grib/ bstan kyang mi 'phel/ ma bstan kyang / mi 'phel ba ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
6b4(nyi khri): pa/ de de bzhin no rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ chos zab mo 'di bstan kyang / yongs su mi 'grib/ ma bstan kyang / yongs su mi 'grib/ bstan kyang mi 'phel/ ma ba
6b5(nyi khri): kyang mi 'phe'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ nam mtsho'i bar du bzhugs zhing / nam mkha'i
6b6(nyi khri): legs pa 'am/ ma legs pa brjod kyang / nam mkha' ni legs par brjod pas/ yongs su 'phel ba med do// nyes pa brjod pas/ yongs su 'grib pa med do// na mkha'
6b7(nyi khri): la ni/ legs pa brjod kyang / 'phe' ba med do// nyes pa brjod kyang / 'grib pa med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ni legs pa brjod kyang 'phel ba
6b8(nyi khri): med do// nyes pa brjod kyang yongs su 'grib pa med do// legs par brjod kyang / chags par 'gyur ba med do// nyes par brjod kyang / khong khro bar 'gyur ba med do// rab
7a1(nyi khri): 'byor de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni/ bstan kyang de bzhin/ ma bstan kyang de bzhin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang
7a2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i tshe zhum pa dang / g.yeng bar mi 'gyur ba dang / shes
7a3(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson par mi bgyid cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar mi ldog pa ni/ dka' ba bgyid pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
7a4(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'di ni/ nam mkha' bsgom pa ste/ nam mkha' la ni gzug
7a5(nyi khri): ma mchis so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mchis so// nam mkha' la ni skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ma
7a6(nyi khri): mchis so// nam mkha' la ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// tshul khrims kyis pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
7a7(nyi khri): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni nang stong pa nyid ma mchis so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
7a8(nyi khri): kyi bar du ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma mchis so// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang /
7b1(nyi khri): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa
7b2(nyi khri): rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
7b3(nyi khri): med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzugs kyi sgo rnams ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni de
7b4(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
7b5(nyi khri): pa bco brgyad ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma mchis so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang
7b6(nyi khri): byang chub ma mchis so// nam mkha' la ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis/ go cha
7b7(nyi khri): 'di 'tshal de dag ni phyag bgyi bar 'os pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gang gis go cha 'di 'tshal ba de dag ni/ na mkha'i don du brtson par mos/ 'bad par mos/ rtsol bar mos pa dag ste/
7b8(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can rnams kyi slad du/ go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni/ na mkha' yongs su smin par 'tshal zhing / yongs su grol bar 'tshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
8a1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// na mkha' lta bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du/ go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni go che chen po 'tshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das
8a2(nyi khri): sems can rnams kyi slad du/ go cha 'tshal ba de dag ni na mkha' bar snang la gdeg par 'tshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sems can rnams kyi
8a3(nyi khri): slad du/ sman med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa de dag ni/ brtson 'grus chen po thob pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / sems
8a4(nyi khri): can rnams don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa de dag ni go cha chen po 'tshal ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang na mkha' lta
8a5(nyi khri): bu'i chos rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni/ dpa' bo bsam gyi mi khyab mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'i
8a6(nyi khri): go cha 'tshal ba'o// de ci'i srid du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di/ 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dam bu'i dbyings sam/ 'od ma'i chal
8a7(nyi khri): lam/ bu ram shing gi tshal lam/ smig ma'i tshal lam/ 'bras kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
8a8(nyi khri): gis kyang bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa'i lhag mar chos bstan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can tshad ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / bcom ldan
8b1(nyi khri): 'das sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa 'am gang bar mi gda'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ de bzhin du gal te phyogs bcu'i phyog/
8b2(nyi khri): re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na 'di lta ste dper na/ bdam bu'i dbyings sam/ 'od ma'i tshal lam/ bu rab shing gi tshal lam/ sdig pa'i tshal lam/ 'bras
8b3(nyi khri): kyi zhing ngam/ til gyi zhing bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mang pos yongs su gang bar gyur la/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang bskal pa'am/ skal pa'i lhag mar chos ston te/ de
8b4(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa re res sems can ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gyi khams la 'grib pa 'am gang bar mi gda'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems
8b5(nyi khri): can ma mchis pa dang / sems can dben pa'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na/ bdag 'di skad du sems can rnams kyi slad du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
8b6(nyi khri): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de dag ni/ nam mkha' yongs su smin par 'tshal zhing / yongs su dgrol bar 'tshal ba lags shes mchi'o// de nas dge slong gcig gcig 'di snyam
8b7(nyi khri): du gyur te/ gang la chos gang skye ba dang / 'gag pa yang med la/ tshul khrims kyi phung po yang yod/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam pa
8b8(nyi khri): grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po yang yod/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang yod/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang
9a1(nyi khri): rngub kyang yod/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang yod/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa
9a2(nyi khri): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyang yod/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yod/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge
9a3(nyi khri): 'dun dkon mchog kyang yod/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang yod pa'i/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo snyam pa dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
9a4(nyi khri): gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la brtson par
9a5(nyi khri): byed pa zhig yod na/ de la gang brtson par byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab par sems dpa' de ni/ na mkha' stong pa
9a6(nyi khri): la brtson pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang po rgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
9a7(nyi khri): phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid pa de la bdag gis bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab pa ji lta bu zhig
9a8(nyi khri): bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du gsol// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke 'u shi ka khyod kyis gang la bsrung ba dang /
9b1(nyi khri): rdzawa dang
9b2(nyi khri): bskyang ba dang / bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor bdag gis gang la bsrung ba dang / ci bskyab par bya ba'i chos de lta bu
9b3(nyi khri): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ji skad du bstan pa'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
9b4(nyi khri): na/ de nyid de'i bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par 'gyur ro// gal te ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na/ de la mi 'am mi ma yin
9b5(nyi khri): pa glags tshol ba rnams kyis glags rnyed par 'gyur ro// gang ji skad du bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni she rab kyi pha rol
9b6(nyi khri): tu phyin pa dang bral bar rig par bya'o// ke'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang /
9b7(nyi khri): bskyab par gang sems pa de ni/ na mkha' la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / skyab par sems pa ste/ de ni bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing / dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyuro//
9b8(nyi khri): ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / sprul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par
9b9(nyi khri): nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha
10a1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni/ bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i sal ba can du 'gyur
10a2(nyi khri): ro// ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin
10a3(nyi khri): gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung
10a4(nyi khri): ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni/ bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dab pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyis chos kyi
10a5(nyi khri): dbyings dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / de bzhin nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings la bsrung ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par nus sam/ brgya byin gyis smras
10a6(nyi khri): pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ni mi nus so// smras pa/ ke'u shi ka de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnams bsrung
10a7(nyi khri): ba dang / bskyang ba dang / bskyab par gang sems pa de ni/ bsam pa ltar mi 'grub cing dub pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i dbang po/ brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
10a8(nyi khri): 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa// rmi lam lta bu'i
10b1(nyi khri): nas rab kyi rol tu phyin pa na myong ba na
10b2(nyi khri): chos dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i chos rnams yongs su shes pa dang / de ltar yongs su shes pas/ byang
10b3(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dang chen po// rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed/ sprub pa'i bar du rlom semasu mi
10b4(nyi khri): byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ke'u shi ka gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
10b5(nyi khri): po/ 6gzugs rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ gzugs la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems
10b6(nyi khri): su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// tshor ba dang /
10b7(nyi khri): 'du she dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam par shes pas rlo mo semasu mi byed/ rnam par shes pa la rlom sems su mi byed na/ rmi lam rlom sems su
10b8(nyi khri): mi byed/ rmilam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rdos
10b9(nyi khri): sems su mi byed do// skye ched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rlom sems su mi byed/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bas rlom sems su mi byed/ rten cing 'brel
11a1(nyi khri): bar 'byung ba la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do//
11a2(nyi khri): sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang
11a3(nyi khri): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun rlom sems su mi byed/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu
11a4(nyi khri): rtsa bdun la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyi rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi
11a5(nyi khri): byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med
11a6(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyom par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
11a7(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa rnams rlom sems su mi byed/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ mngon par shes pa rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sem
11a8(nyi khri): su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la/
11b1(nyi khri): rlom sems su mi byed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams rlom sems su mi byed/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ gzungs kyi rnams la rlom
11b2(nyi khri): sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlom sems su mi byed na/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul
11b3(nyi khri): pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / ro so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang
11b4(nyi khri): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad rlom sems su mi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis rlom sems su mi byed/
11b5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis rlob sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do//
11b6(nyi khri): sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa la rlom sems su mi byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rlom sems su
11b7(nyi khri): mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis rlom sems su mi byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rlom sems su mi byed na/ de rmi lam rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam gyis
11b8(nyi khri): rlom sems su mi byed/ rmi lam la rlom sems su mi byed do// sprul pa'i bar du rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pas rlom sems su mi byed/ sprul pa pa rlom semasu mi byed do//
12a1(nyi khri): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i/
12a2(nyi khri): lha dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / gnas gca
12a3(nyi khri): ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha'i bu gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi phye mas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor zhing / bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der
12a4(nyi khri): dong ste/ lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu khod do// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi
12a5(nyi khri): mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis/ chos ston
12a6(nyi khri): par mtshan 'di nyid mnga' ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhub
12a7(nyi khri): dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems kyis mthong bar gyur to// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang /
12a8(nyi khri): byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing / sangs rgyas stong yi ge 'di dag nyid kyi/ chos ston pa mtshan 'di nyid mangs
12b1(nyi khri): / ba/ dge slong rab 'byor ces bya ba sha stag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu ba dang / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya
12b2(nyi khri): byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid zhu zhing / yongs su dri ba sems kyis mthong bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
12b3(nyi khri): bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang / sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs
12b4(nyi khri): rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing / 'chad par 'gyur ro// gang yang bskal pa bzang po 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
12b5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag kyang / sa'i phyogs 'di nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston cing mchad par 'gyur ro//
12b6(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang dang / rtags gang dang / mtshan ma gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
12b7(nyi khri): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyi ston cing 'chad par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
12b8(nyi khri): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'di la rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
13a1(nyi khri): mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal
13a2(nyi khri): zhes bya ba 'am/ gzugs bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ gzugs sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs zhi zhes bya ba 'am/
13a3(nyi khri): ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs cings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzugs 'das shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba
13a4(nyi khri): 'am/ da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur
13a5(nyi khri): ro// rnam par shes pa bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ rnam par shes pa bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ rnam par shes pa sdug ces bya ba 'am/
13a6(nyi khri): mi sdug ces bya bar ma chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma ni zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes
13a7(nyi khri): bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam par shes pa 'das shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// skye mched dang / khams dang /
13a8(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ rten cing 'brel/
13b1(nyi khri): ma [редрд╜ред]
13b2(nyi khri): bar 'byung ba bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
13b3(nyi khri): bzhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rten cing 'brel
13b4(nyi khri): bar 'byung ba 'das zhes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang
13b5(nyi khri): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya
13b6(nyi khri): ba 'am/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun sdug ces bya ba'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun nizhi zhes bya ba
13b7(nyi khri): 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi
13b8(nyi khri): phyog kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun 'das zhes bya ba'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan nas
13b9(nyi khri): rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug dgu dang / stong pa nyid
14a1(nyi khri): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa
14a2(nyi khri): rnams bde zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ mngon pa shes pa rnams sdug ces
14a3(nyi khri): bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa
14a4(nyi khri): rnams bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// mngon par shes pa rnams 'das zhes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs pa shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya
14a5(nyi khri): bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams bde
14a6(nyi khri): zhes bya ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams bdag ces bya ba'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi
14a7(nyi khri): sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma ni zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams bcings shes
14a8(nyi khri): bye ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// gzungs kyi sgo rnams 'das shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar
14b1(nyi khri): chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
14b2(nyi khri): pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi rlo ma 'dres pa rnams bde zhes bya ba'am/ sdug sngal zhes bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas
14b3(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sdug ces bya ba 'am/ mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi
14b4(nyi khri): 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bcings shes bya ba
14b5(nyi khri): 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung ba zhes bya bar chos ston
14b6(nyi khri): par mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bde zhes bya
14b7(nyi khri): ba 'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya ba 'am/ bdag med ces bya ba 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug ces bya ba 'am/
14b8(nyi khri): mi sdug ces bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid zhi zhes bya ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
15a1(nyi khri): pa nyid bcings shes bya ba 'am/ grol zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'das shes bya ba 'am/ ma 'ongs
15a2(nyi khri): shes bya ba 'am/ da ltar byung zhes bya bar chos ston par mi 'gyur ro// bsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// byam pa bla na med pa yang dag pa
15a3(nyi khri): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos ni ji ltar ston par 'gyur/ ston na ni ji zhig ston par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
15a4(nyi khri): gzugs shin tu rnam par dag go zhes/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa shin du rnam par dag
15a5(nyi khri): go zhes/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba shin tu rnam pa dag go zhes/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
15a6(nyi khri): chos ston par 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun shin tu rnam par dag go zhes/ shin tu rnam
15a7(nyi khri): par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bas pa gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
15a8(nyi khri): dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa/ med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams shin tu rnam pa
15b1(nyi khri): dag go zhes/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams shin tu rnam par dag go/ zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
15b2(nyi khri): chos ston par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam
15b3(nyi khri): shin tu rnam par dag go/ zhes shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du shin tu rnam par dag go/ zhes shin du rnam
15b4(nyi khri): par dag pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom lnga 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yongs su dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
15b5(nyi khri): gzugs yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongasu pa'i phyir/ shes
15b6(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yo
15b7(nyi khri): su dag pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
15b8(nyi khri): pa yongs su dag pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar kyis gnas
16a1(nyi khri): ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab
16a2(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa
16a3(nyi khri): stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o//
16a4(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ gzugs yongs su
16a5(nyi khri): dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa legs/ ji ltar na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab
16a6(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa
16a7(nyi khri): lags/ ji ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
16a8(nyi khri): pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
16b1(nyi khri): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
16b2(nyi khri): phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na tinge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs
16b3(nyi khri): pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jig pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
16b4(nyi khri): su dag pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
16b5(nyi khri): stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni/ gzugs yongs su dag pa'o// tshor ba dang /
16b6(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam par shes pa yongs su
16b7(nyi khri): dag pa'o// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa
16b8(nyi khri): ni/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yongs su dag pa'o// pha rol tu phyin thams cad dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun la skye ba med pa dang /
17a1(nyi khri): 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yongs su dag pa'o//
17a2(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
17a3(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa
17a4(nyi khri): dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni mngon par shes pa yongs su dag pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la skye ba med pa dang /
17a5(nyi khri): 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni gzungs kyi sgo yongs su dag pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs
17a6(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam
17a7(nyi khri): par byang ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad yongs su dag pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun
17a8(nyi khri): nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yong su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang na mkha' yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ shes
17b1(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na na mkha' yongs su dag pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa
17b2(nyi khri): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mong pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir nam
17b3(nyi khri): mkha' yongs su dag pa ste/ rab 'byor na mkha' la 'go ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa yongasasu dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar/
17b4(nyi khri): nan mkha' la 'go ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' bzung du med pa
17b5(nyi khri): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor na mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bco
17b6(nyi khri): ldan 'das ji ltar na na mkha' la tha snyad ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka bstsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di lta
17b7(nyi khri): ste dper na/ namakha'i sgra brnyan gnyis kyi sgra ltar na mkha' la tha snyad med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor na mkha' brjod du med pa'i phyir/
17b8(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar nan mkha' brjod du ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa
18a1(nyi khri): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' la ni gang yang brjod du med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du na mkha' brjod du med
18a2(nyi khri): pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang na mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa
18a3(nyi khri): 'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na na mkha' dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
18a4(nyi khri): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor na mkha' la gang yang dmigs su med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du nam mkha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
18a5(nyi khri): dag pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi
18a6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa ma
18a7(nyi khri): mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad shin
18a8(nyi khri): tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig
18b1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'changs pa dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la bgyid na/ bcom ldan 'das de la mig gi nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//
18b2(nyi khri): rna ba'i nad dang / sna'i nang dang / lce'i nad dang / yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur ro// lus ngan par mi 'gyur ro// rgas pas 'khogs pa'i lus su mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu
18b3(nyi khri): 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni mi bde ba mi spong ba dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// de'i slad bzhin du lha brgya stong mang po 'brang bar 'gyur te/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /
18b4(nyi khri): gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams kyang slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro// gang na chos smra ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
18b5(nyi khri): ston pa der yang tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la lha'i tshogs chen po 'du bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
18b6(nyi khri): de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu mang po tshad ma mchis pa/ grangs ma mchis pa/ bsam gyi mi
18b7(nyi khri): khyab pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang / gzhal du ma mchis pa dpag tu ma mchis pa/ rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin
18b8(nyi khri): no// de de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang tshe brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang / bco lnga dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lnga'i 'khor gyi mdun du ston pa'i
19a1(nyi khri): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel te/ bsod nams kyi phung po mang po// tshad med pa grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab
19a2(nyi khri): pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa dpag tu med pa/ rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rin po che'o//
19a3(nyi khri): rab 'byor de la sher rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che 'di yin te/ sems can dmyal ba las yongs su grol bar byed pa'o// byol song gyi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
19a4(nyi khri): dang / mi dang lha dbul pos yongs su grol bar byed pa'o// rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o// khyim bdag
19a5(nyi khri): gi rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs 'byin pa'o// rgyal chen bzhi po ris kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye mched 'byin pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
19a6(nyi khri): 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'byin pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub 'byin pa'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'byin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
19a7(nyi khri): de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdi las dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam brgyas par bstan te/ de lang bslabs pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rig
19a8(nyi khri): che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang dga' ldan dang /
19a9(nyi khri): rgya 'du shes med 'du shes med skye mched kyi lha'i skye ba'i skye ched 'byin pa'o//
19b1(nyi khri): 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha yod do// tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / rlung snang dang /
19b2(nyi khri): tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / rlung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che dang / mi che ba dang /
19b3(nyi khri): mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched
19b4(nyi khri): dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
19b5(nyi khri): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid dang rang byang chub yod do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
19b6(nyi khri): 'di yod na/ bsam gtan bzhi yod do// tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yod do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa
19b7(nyi khri): bdun yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bas
19b8(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yod do// 'phags pa'i/
20a1(nyi khri): bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bani dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
20a2(nyi khri): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug par dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo
20a3(nyi khri): thams cad yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas
20a4(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yod do// de yang 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan
20a5(nyi khri): te/ de la bslabs nas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal
20a6(nyi khri): chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha
20a7(nyi khri): nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / rlung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas
20a8(nyi khri): dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams yod do//
20b1(nyi khri): na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//
20b2(nyi khri): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa'
20b3(nyi khri): yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// de bas na de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che zhes bya'o// pha rol tu phyin/
20b4(nyi khri): pa rin po che de la ni/ chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su bzung ba 'am/ dor ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
20b5(nyi khri): de ni 'di ltar gang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba 'am/ yongs su bzung ba 'am/ dor ba bya ba'i chos de lta bu med do// rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin
20b6(nyi khri): pa rin che 'di la ni/ dge ba'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa med pa 'am/ 'du byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi
20b7(nyi khri): chos gang yang dmigs su med do// rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang / pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che ni dmigs su med do// rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa rin po che la ni/ chos gang gis kyang 'gro
20b8(nyi khri): ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhes na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'go bar 'gyur ba'i chos de lta bu dmigs su med de/ rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'go ba med pa'i pha rol
21a1(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/
21a2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa rin po che'o// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ de ltar 'du shes
21a3(nyi khri): par yang mi byed/ de ltar mi rtog cing / de ltar mi dmigs te/ de ltar 'phro bar mi byed na/ 1shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa'o// de ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
21a4(nyi khri): mnyes par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par bsams shing / bcom ldan 'das de dag la rim gror bya ba dang bkur sti bya ba dang / sti stang du bya ba dang /
21a5(nyi khri): mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba byed cing //
21a6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos gang yang ston pa 'am/ rnam par ston pa'am/ yongasu ston
21a7(nyi khri): pa'am/ 'dzin par byed pa'am/ 'byin par byed pa'am/ skye bar byed pa 'am/ 'gag par byed pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar byed pa'am/
21a8(nyi khri): 'grib par byed pa'am/ 'phel bar byed pa'am/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung bar byed pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dod
21a9(nyi khri): pa'i khams las 'das par byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin gnas par byed pa/ yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams
21b1(nyi khri): 'dor ba ma yin
21b2(nyi khri): las 'da' bar byed pa ma yin/ gnas par byed par ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
21b3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid bsgrub pa ma yin//
21b4(nyi khri): 'dor ba ma yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma
21b5(nyi khri): yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/
21b6(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin//
21b7(nyi khri): 'dor ba ma yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jig pa rnams dang / so
21b8(nyi khri): so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
21b9(nyi khri): 'bras bu sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/
22a1(nyi khri): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub pa ma yin/ 'dor ba ma yin no// /
22a2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa// bam po gnyis pa// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dus byas kyi khams 'dor ba ma yin/ 'dus ma
22a3(nyi khri): byas kyi khams sgrub pa ma yin/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid dang / chos kyi
22a4(nyi khri): dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa de ni/ de bzhin du gnas pa yin te/ de ni de gshegs par mngon par sangs rgyas so// mngon par thugs su chud
22a5(nyi khri): do// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud nas kyang gsung ngo // ston to// brjod do// 'grel to// rnam par 'byed do// gsal bar mdzad
22a6(nyi khri): do// yang dag par ston to// de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po dang / steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas/ ljang lcang ldegs kyi sgra byung ste/ lha rdzas kyi me tog ud pa la dang / pad mo dang /
22a7(nyi khri): ku mo ta dang / pun da ri ka dang / man dar ba dang / man da ra ba chen po mthor zhing / 'di skad kyi tshig gis brjod par 'gyur ro// kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pas
22a8(nyi khri): b+ha'i bu stong phrag du ma skye ba med pa'i rdzas chos la bzod pa skyes par gyur to// 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa bskor bar mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
22b1(nyi khri): gnas brtan rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis su bskor ba ma yin gcig tu bskor
22b2(nyi khri): ba yang ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos gang yang 'khor ba 'am/ mi 'khor bar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa ma yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
22b3(nyi khri): de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'o chos gang yang / 'khor bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ nye bar mi gnas pa'i dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de gang
22b4(nyi khri): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
22b5(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ sbyin pa'i
22b6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo //
22b7(nyi khri): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs
22b8(nyi khri): rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
23a1(nyi khri): dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad
23a2(nyi khri): dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / med pa mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams/ mngon
23a3(nyi khri): bar shes pa rnams kyis stong ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi stong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
23a4(nyi khri): dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams/ sang
23a5(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo // rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bus stong ngo // lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
23a6(nyi khri): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bus stong ngo // dgra bcom pa nyid dgra bcom pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rang byang chub kyang / rang byang chub kyis sto //
23a7(nyi khri): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis
23a8(nyi khri): stong ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chen mo ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
23b1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pas rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o// de ni chos thams cad kyang / chos thams cad kyis stong la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang //
23b2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma 'tshal/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
23b3(nyi khri): la chos gang yang 'khor ba 'am/ mi 'khor ba 'am/ rab tu 'khor bar bgyid pa ma mchis te/ de dag gis chos gang yang yongs su mthong ba 'am/ yongs su
23b4(nyi khri): ma mthong bar ma mchis so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa'i chos de lta bu dmigs su ma mchis te/ de ni 'di
23b5(nyi khri): ltar chos thams cad shin du mngon par ma grub pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ stong pa nyid ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lags so// mtshan ma ma
23b6(nyi khri): mchis pa ni 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am/ mi 'khor ba bgyid pa ma lags/ smon pa med pa ma mchis pa ni/ 'khor bar bgyid pa 'am/ mi 'khor bar bgyid pa ma lag se/
23b7(nyi khri): de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang / rab tu bstan pa dang / bsgrags pa dang / rab tu bkod pa dang / gzhag pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang / rnam par
23b8(nyi khri): grol ba dang / smos pa dang / gsal bar bgyid pa/ yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa yongs su dag pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol
24a1(nyi khri): tu phyin pa bstan pa de yang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung ngo // gang sus kyang ma bstan/ sus kyang ma bzung ba de ni/ sus kyang mngon dum
24a2(nyi khri): bgyis pa de la ni/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ma mchis te/ chos bstan pa 'di la gang su yang / sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ba ma mchis so// // shes rab kyi pha
24a3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u nyi shu brgyad pa'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ad
24a4(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ na mkha' med pa'i phyir ro// gsol
24a5(nyi khri): pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mnyam
24a6(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rnam par dben pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
24a7(nyi khri): sgrub pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ thub pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol du phyin
24a8(nyi khri): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su ma mchis pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
24b1(nyi khri): phyin pa 'di ni gnas mar chis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ming dang / lus med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
24b2(nyi khri): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ na mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro// bsol pa/
24b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ brjod du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog
24b4(nyi khri): pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ming ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu
24b5(nyi khri): phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ btso
24b6(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad
24b7(nyi khri): 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'diH ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/ mi 'phrogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
24b8(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ skad cig pa
25a1(nyi khri): ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad byang zhing zad pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ btso
25a2(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni skye ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad skye ba dang /
25a3(nyi khri): 'gag pa med pa'i phyir ro/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
25a4(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ byed pa po dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ shes pa po ma mchis pa'i
25a5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shes pa po dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
25a6(nyi khri): tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'chi ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'chi ba dang skye ba dmigasu med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
25a7(nyi khri): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'jig pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig
25a8(nyi khri): pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rmi lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis stsal pa/
25b1(nyi khri): rmi lam mthong ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sgra brnyan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
25b2(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyan pa dang / sgra brjod pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bco ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mig yod
25b3(nyi khri): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ me long gi bzhin dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
25b4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sgyu ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu 'bab pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
25b5(nyi khri): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ smig rgyu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtshan ma dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/
25b6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rmongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ma rig pa'i mun pa
25b7(nyi khri): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pA 'di ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
25b8(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rnam par
26a1(nyi khri): byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
26a2(nyi khri): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dmigs su ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gnas dmigs su med pa
26a3(nyi khri): phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ spros pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
26a4(nyi khri): pa/ spros pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rlom sems ma mchis pa'i
26a5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rlom sems thams cad yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
26a6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mig yor ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos kyi dbyings gnas nyid kyi phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di/
26a7(nyi khri): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad nor pa yang dag pa nyid du
26a8(nyi khri): mngon par 'tshang brgya bar byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ kun nas ldang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin/
26b1(nyi khri): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
26b2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med cing dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/
26b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dod chags pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dod
26b4(nyi khri): chags dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ zhe sdang ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// btso
26b5(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhe sdang yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ gti mug ma
26b6(nyi khri): mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi shes pa'i mun pa thams cad sel pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'di lta/
26b7(nyi khri): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yongs su rtog pa med
26b8(nyi khri): phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa 'di ni/ sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
27a1(nyi khri): bka' sprul pa/ sems can med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/
27a2(nyi khri): rab tu spangs pa'i phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
27a3(nyi khri): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtha' gnyis su mi 'gyur ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das blaka' stsal pa/ mtha' rnam par spong ba'i phyir ro//
27a4(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ tha mi dad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos
27a5(nyi khri): thams cad 'dres pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lnga ste/ nyams pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
27a6(nyi khri): stsal pa/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das par byed pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di ni/
27a7(nyi khri): rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/
27a8(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ tshad ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad kyi tshad
27b1(nyi khri): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ na mkha'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
27b2(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad la chags pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mi rtag
27b3(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad 'jig pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
27b4(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sdug bsngal ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad tshol bar spong ba med pa'i phyir ro//
27b5(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ gdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
27b6(nyi khri): pal chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid
27b7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes
27b8(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad grub pa med pa'i phyir//
28a1(nyi khri): / gsol pa ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ nang stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
28a2(nyi khri): nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom
28a3(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid
28a4(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
28a5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro//
28a6(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chen po stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
28a7(nyi khri): chen po stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol
28a8(nyi khri): tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ don dam pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
28b1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'dus byes stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'das byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir
28b2(nyi khri): ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ 'das ma byas stong po nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
28b3(nyi khri): stsal pa/ 'das ma byas stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mtha' las
28b4(nyi khri): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dmyigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/
28b5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
28b6(nyi khri): pa/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dor ba med
28b7(nyi khri): pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
28b8(nyi khri): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma
29a1(nyi khri): byas kyi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ chos tha
29a2(nyi khri): cad stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ phyi nang gi chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di/
29a3(nyi khri): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rang gi mtshan nyid
29a4(nyi khri): stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha le rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu
29a5(nyi khri): phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
29a6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro//
29a7(nyi khri): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
29a8(nyi khri): chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis dben pa'i phyir ro// gsob/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi pha rol
29b1(nyi khri): tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dbyigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/
29b2(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus dang / tshor ba dang sems dang / chos dmigs
29b3(nyi khri): su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdi lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yang dag par spong ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
29b4(nyi khri): stsal pa/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i
29b5(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
29b6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ dbang po lnga'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang po lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
29b7(nyi khri): lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stobs lnga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom
29b8(nyi khri): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
30a1(nyi khri): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni kham gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi pha rol tu
30a2(nyi khri): phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'das 'di lta ste/
30a3(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / rnam par dben pa'i rnam pa
30a4(nyi khri): dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
30a5(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// bsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ smon pa med pa'i/
30a6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ smon pa med pa'i dmyigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
30a7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ rnam par thar pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro// gsol pa/
30a8(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir/ mthar gyi gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
